mapper.insert: INSERT INTO food (food_no, seller_email, food_cat_a_no, food_cat_b_no, food_cat_c_no, food_name, food_quant, food_expiry_date, food_origin, food_sale, food_flavor, food_price, food_carbo, food_protein, food_fat, food_cal, food_size, food_original, food_stored) VALUES (#{foodNo}, #{sellerEmail}, #{foodCatANo}, #{foodCatBNo}, #{foodCatCNo}, #{foodName}, #{foodQuant}, #{foodExpiryDate}, #{foodOrigin}, #{foodSale}, #{foodFlavor}, #{foodPrice}, #{foodCarbo}, #{foodProtein}, #{foodFat}, #{foodCal}, #{foodSize}, #{foodOriginal}, #{foodStored})
mapper.select: SELECT food_cat_a_no, food_cat_b_no, food_cat_c_no, food_cat_a_name FROM food_cat_a WHERE food_cat_c_no = #{foodCatCNo} and food_cat_b_no = #{foodCatBNo}
SELECT food_cat_b_no, food_cat_c_no, food_cat_b_name FROM food_cat_b WHERE food_cat_c_no = #{foodCatCNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE food SET FOOD_CAT_A_NO = #{foodCatANo}, FOOD_CAT_B_NO = #{foodCatBNo}, FOOD_CAT_C_NO = #{foodCatCNo}, FOOD_NAME = #{foodName}, FOOD_QUANT = #{foodQuant}, FOOD_EXPIRY_DATE = #{foodExpiryDate}, FOOD_ORIGIN = #{foodOrigin}, FOOD_SALE = #{foodSale}, FOOD_FLAVOR = #{foodFlavor}, FOOD_PRICE = #{foodPrice}, FOOD_CARBO = #{foodCarbo}, FOOD_PROTEIN = #{foodProtein}, FOOD_FAT = #{foodFat}, FOOD_CAL = #{foodCal}, FOOD_SIZE = #{foodSize}, FOOD_ORIGINAL = #{foodOriginal}, FOOD_STORED = #{foodStored} WHERE FOOD_NO = #{foodNo}
mapper.select: SELECT food_no, seller_email, food_cat_a_no, food_cat_b_no, food_cat_c_no, food_name, food_quant, food_expiry_date, food_origin, food_sale, food_flavor, food_price, food_carbo, food_protein, food_fat, food_cal, food_size, food_original, food_stored FROM food WHERE seller_email = #{sellerEmail} order by food_no

SELECT food_no, seller_email, food_cat_a_no, food_cat_b_no, food_cat_c_no, food_name, food_quant, food_expiry_date, food_origin, food_sale, food_flavor, food_price, food_carbo, food_protein, food_fat, food_cal, food_size, food_original, food_stored FROM food WHERE food_no = #{foodNo}

SELECT food_no, f.seller_email, food_cat_a_no, food_cat_b_no, food_cat_c_no, food_name, food_quant, food_expiry_date, food_origin, food_sale, food_flavor, food_price, food_carbo, food_protein, food_fat, food_cal, food_size, food_original, food_stored, sa.seller_name, sa.store_name, sa.store_telphone, sa.store_addr FROM food f, seller_application sa WHERE f.seller_email = sa.seller_email order by food_no

SELECT food_no, f.seller_email, food_cat_a_no, food_cat_b_no, food_cat_c_no, food_name, food_quant, food_expiry_date, food_origin, food_sale, food_flavor, food_price, food_carbo, food_protein, food_fat, food_cal, food_size, food_original, food_stored, sa.seller_name, sa.store_name, sa.store_telphone, sa.store_addr FROM food f, seller_application sa WHERE f.seller_email = sa.seller_email and f.food_no = #{foodNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO food_review( food_review_no, member_email, food_no, seller_email, food_cat_a_no, food_cat_b_no, food_cat_c_no, food_review_regdate, food_review_food_name, food_review_title, food_review_score, food_review_comment, food_review_size, food_review_original, food_review_stored ) VALUES( #{foodReviewNo}, #{memberEmail}, #{foodNo}, #{sellerEmail}, #{foodCatANo}, #{foodCatBNo}, #{foodCatCNo}, #{foodReviewRegdate}, #{foodReviewFoodName}, #{foodReviewTitle}, #{foodReviewScore}, #{foodReviewComment}, #{foodReviewSize}, #{foodReviewOriginal}, #{foodReviewStored} )
mapper.select: SELECT fr.food_review_no, fr.member_email, fr.food_no, fr.seller_email, fr.food_cat_a_no, fr.food_cat_b_no, fr.food_cat_c_no, food_review_regdate, food_review_food_name, food_review_title, food_review_score, food_review_comment, food_review_size, food_review_original, food_review_stored, food_review_answer_no, food_review_answer_content, food_review_answer_regdate FROM food_review fr, food_review_answer fra WHERE fr.food_review_no = fra.food_review_no(+) AND fr.food_no = #{foodNo} ORDER BY food_review_regdate
mapper.update: UPDATE food_review SET food_review_no = #{foodReviewNo}, member_email = #{memberEmail}, food_no = #{foodNo}, seller_email = #{sellerEmail}, food_cat_a_no = #{foodCatANo}, food_cat_b_no = #{foodCatBNo}, food_cat_c_no = #{foodCatCNo}, food_review_regdate = #{foodReviewRegdate}, food_review_food_name = #{foodReviewFoodName}, food_review_title = #{foodReviewTitle}, food_review_score = #{foodReviewScore}, food_review_comment = #{foodReviewComment}, food_review_size = #{foodReviewSize}, food_review_original = #{foodReviewOriginal}, food_review_stored = #{foodReviewStored} WHERE food_review_no = #{foodReviewNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FOOD_REVIEW_ANSWER( FOOD_REVIEW_NO, MEMBER_EMAIL, FOOD_NO, SELLER_EMAIL, FOOD_REVIEW_ANSWER_NO, FOOD_CAT_A_NO, FOOD_CAT_B_NO, FOOD_CAT_C_NO, FOOD_REVIEW_ANSWER_CONTENT, FOOD_REVIEW_ANSWER_REGDATE ) VALUES( #{foodReviewNo}, #{memberEmail}, #{foodNo}, #{sellerEmail}, #{foodReviewAnswerNo}, #{foodCatANo}, #{foodCatBNo}, #{foodCatCNo}, #{foodReviewAnswerContent}, #{foodReviewAnswerRegdate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE food_review_answer SET food_review_no = #{foodReviewNo}, member_email = #{memberEmail}, food_no = #{foodNo}, seller_email = #{sellerEmail}, food_review_answer_no= #{foodReviewAnswerNo}, food_cat_a_no = #{foodCatANo}, food_cat_b_no = #{foodCatBNo}, food_cat_c_no = #{foodCatCNo}, food_review_answer_content = #{foodReviewAnswerContent}, food_review_answer_regdate = #{foodReviewAnswerRegdate} WHERE food_review_answer_no = #{foodReviewAnswerNo}
